ruleset.name: Braces Rules (JavaTddPlugin version)
ruleset.description: The Braces Ruleset contains a collection of braces rules. This version of the ruleset includes alternate messages from the main PMD rulesets/braces.xml ruleset.

rule.message: It is a good idea to always enclose the code in the body of an if statement in braces. It helps to reduce the likelihood of errors.
It is a good idea to always enclose the code in the body of a while loop in braces. It helps to reduce the likelihood of errors.
It is a good idea to always enclose the code in the body of both the if and the else clauses in braces. It helps to reduce the likelihood of errors.
It is a good idea to always enclose the code in the body of a for loop in braces. It helps to reduce the likelihood of errors.
